game.name: Tommy The Monkey Pilot
game.description:
The little monkey has a big dream of flying an aeroplane. There are several missions to complete for him when he is in the air. The cute monkey is new to this type of mission. Would you be able to guide him during this unique adventure? Join Tommy The Monkey Pilot and be prepared to help the cute animal to keep his plane straight in the air! Make sure that he will pop up all the balloons that are showing on the screen.

Collect all the things like starts and avoid dangers to keep him alive until you achieve your goal! These stars you collect will also help to upgrade your plane later. You will always need to be extra careful when his plane is in the sky as the dangerous thunderclouds are waiting for you. Keep your fingers on your mouse to click and hold or tap and hold the screen of your mobile phone steer your plane in this HTML5 flying game!

This lovely monkey wants to save all the balloons for her girlfriend Tina. These cute colourful balloons are scattered in the sky by the evil storm. This has made Tina very sad. Now Tommy has decided to use his triplane and collect all of the balloons to bring her smile back. Fly a plane like a pro pilot and try to get all of them for her love in this brand new adventure game that is available to play online without download! Good luck to enjoy even more challenging and addictive adventure games for boys on atmegame.com and have a blast with your friends!
